participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.background: I took a lot of pictures of my daughters last year. I like to keep my home clean and tidy, but I also have a wild side and enjoy trying new things like auditioning for a talent show. I love growing sunflowers. I am bald with a thick beard. I play the piano to help my siblings relax.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.background: My grandchildren are the light of my life. I am a mom with two sons and a husband. I get along with my family because I love them. I am very popular and have a lot of friends. I want to learn how to use my George Foreman grill to make delicious meals.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
I'm doing great! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out with my family. We're going to go to the movies later. What are you doing?
I'm just working on some music. I'm a musician, and I'm trying to finish a new song.
That's awesome! I love music. I used to play the piano, but I haven't in a while.
Oh, you should get back into it! It's a lot of fun.
I know, I miss it. Maybe I will.
That would be great! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I really love oldies.
Me too! I love the Beatles and the Rolling Stones.
Me too! They're my favorite bands.
Awesome! We should listen to some music together sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to.
